summary: While the trailers for Detective Pikachu have already given away that Mewtwo is in the movie, I like to think the earthquake...
body: While the trailers for Detective Pikachu have already given away that Mewtwo is in the movie, I like to think the earthquake will turn out to be caused by none other than Groudon. I would not mind at all to see the Godzilla-est of pokemon on the big screen right before seeing a new Godzilla movie on the big screen.

reblog.comment: While the trailers for Detective Pikachu have already given away that Mewtwo is in the movie, I like to think the earthquake will turn out to be caused by none other than Groudon. I would not mind at all to see the Godzilla-est of pokemon on the big screen right before seeing a new Godzilla movie on the big screen.

trail.content_raw: While the trailers for Detective Pikachu have already given away that Mewtwo is in the movie, I like to think the earthquake will turn out to be caused by none other than Groudon. I would not mind at all to see the Godzilla-est of pokemon on the big screen right before seeing a new Godzilla movie on the big screen.
trail.content: While the trailers for Detective Pikachu have already given away that Mewtwo is in the movie, I like to think the earthquake will turn out to be caused by none other than Groudon. I would not mind at all to see the Godzilla-est of pokemon on the big screen right before seeing a new Godzilla movie on the big screen.

body:
I just dont get it.

Have ppl who criticize the detective pikachu pokemon never seen ANYTHING depicted in different media.

Like each superhero has like…5 different looks in 12 different cartoons. Then their comic look is different depending on who its drawn by and then there are the movies.

Ppl are literally linking pictures of the cartoons to compare em. The cartoons are just one canon. Like pokemon dont even say their names. Thats an invention if the cartoon. In the video game they werent suppose to.

God its the same with everything. Any movie adaption.

Its an ADAPTION. Its not suppose to be an exact copy with realistic textures its SUPPOSE to be different

worst quality: HIS EYES

blog.name: yourfavehatesautismspeaks
blog.title: All Your Faves Hates Autism $peaks!
blog.description:
REQUESTS ARE CLOSED!

PLEASE READ THE RULES.

Autism $peaks is a trash bag organization that doesn't speak for autistic folks. You know that, we know that, and your favorite characters know that too. Autistic and non-autistic people and characters are all welcome to participate!

Before submitting or requesting, please check the rules and search the character name to avoid duplicates.

Why do we hate Autism Speaks?

TERFs, transmeds, MAPs/paedos, Nazis, racists, LGBTphobes, exclusionists, ableists, stay right away. Further. Further. A little further. That’s it.

summary: Detective Pikachu Products Now Available In preparation for the biggest Pokémon movie to hit theaters, Detective Pikachu...
caption:
Detective Pikachu Products Now Available

In preparation for the biggest Pokémon movie to hit theaters, Detective Pikachu products are now available. It has been an ambitious endeavor taking a 3DS title and turning it into a live action blockbuster. Fans can find a number of items which tie-in to the film.

Check it out!

https://www.hardcoregamer.com/2019/04/06/detective-pikachu-products-now-available/328469/

summary: Ended up looking at some of the trading cards which landed me on the set based on Detective Pikachu.I guess this confirms...
caption: Ended up looking at some of the trading cards which landed me on the set based on Detective Pikachu.I guess this confirms Ditto’s playing a slightly major role and I cannot help but compare its design to one of many semi-translucent slimes you can find in the store these days.You’d think that would be something they could try marketing off of if this is how “real” Dittos are like rather than the solid color representation we have been far too familiar with.

reblog.comment: Ended up looking at some of the trading cards which landed me on the set based on Detective Pikachu.I guess this confirms Ditto’s playing a slightly major role and I cannot help but compare its design to one of many semi-translucent slimes you can find in the store these days.You’d think that would be something they could try marketing off of if this is how “real” Dittos are like rather than the solid color representation we have been far too familiar with.

trail.content_raw: Ended up looking at some of the trading cards which landed me on the set based on Detective Pikachu.I guess this confirms Ditto’s playing a slightly major role and I cannot help but compare its design to one of many semi-translucent slimes you can find in the store these days.You’d think that would be something they could try marketing off of if this is how “real” Dittos are like rather than the solid color representation we have been far too familiar with.
trail.content: Ended up looking at some of the trading cards which landed me on the set based on Detective Pikachu.I guess this confirms Ditto’s playing a slightly major role and I cannot help but compare its design to one of many semi-translucent slimes you can find in the store these days.You’d think that would be something they could try marketing off of if this is how “real” Dittos are like rather than the solid color representation we have been far too familiar with.
